basicInfo.name: Shiro
basicInfo.flavor: After leaving Moonlit Isle, Shiro embarked on a journey to find something truly worth protecting.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Javelin of Resurgence
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 245% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 1 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 245% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Power of Rally
Skill 2.desc:
Self
 - Grants Taunt. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Single-Target Attack Resistance [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Solid Protection
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 20%.

profile.story:
The civil war on Moonlit Isle wasn't a fight for a noble cause.
To most common folk, it was just a power struggle between a few influential families vying for dominance.
For Shiro, who had been big and strong from a young age, the decision to join Waki's faction was simple: they offered more money.
He believed lofty ideals were for leaders to worry about, but for soldiers risking their lives, practical gains mattered most.
But as the war wore on, Shiro began to see things differently.
He realized that, compared to the empty rhetoric of his lord, the opposing leader — a young but genuine and skilled noble — was the one who truly exemplified a better, more just future for Moonlit Isle.

basicInfo.name: Shiro
basicInfo.flavor: From a young age, Shiro had been big and strong, and he believed himself to be the strongest in the world. The promise of great riches and endless battles against powerful foes drew him to Waki's rebellion.
